document.full_text: qatar's oil minister said he does not expect opec to make a "dramatic" decision during the upcoming opec meeting in june, and that the market is still well supplied.
document.title: qatar oil minister does not expect dramatic opec decision
lines_and_colors: qatar's oil minister said he does not expect opec to make a "dramatic" decision during the upcoming opec meeting in june, and that the market is still well supplied.
